source_file: Virk et al. - 2023 - RIDDLE ME THIS A RARE CASE OF DIFFUSE PULMONARY MENINGIOTHELIOMAS.pdf

evidence.exact_quote: In our case, the patient was diagnosed with DPM

evidence.extracted_value: Diagnosed incidentally during COVID-19 admission, asymptomatic
evidence.exact_quote: diagnosed with diffuse pulmonary nodules incidentally via CT angiogram chest during inpatient admission for COVID-19 infection

evidence.extracted_value: bronchoscopy with bronchioalveolar lavage (BAL) with transbronchial cryo biopsy
evidence.exact_quote: The patient eventually underwent bronchoscopy with bronchioalveolar lavage (BAL) with transbronchial cryo biopsy of lung nodules

evidence.extracted_value: numerous sub 6 mm bilateral centrilobular GGNs and solid pulmonary nodules with mild upper lobe predominance
evidence.exact_quote: follow-up CT scan chest 1 year later showed numerous sub 6 mm bilateral centrilobular GGNs and solid pulmonary nodules with mild upper lobe predominance
transbronchial cryo biopsy of lung nodules, which showed MPMNs

evidence.extracted_value: close follow-up with serial CT scans
evidence.exact_quote: a decision was made for close follow-up with serial CT scans
given the complexity of the case, lack of symptoms, and stability of nodules

evidence.extracted_value: ductal hyperplasia of the breast, common variable immunodeficiency syndrome (CVID), asthma, obstructive sleep apnea, and thyroid follicular cancer
evidence.exact_quote: history of ductal hyperplasia of the breast, common variable immunodeficiency syndrome (CVID), asthma, obstructive sleep apnea, and thyroid follicular cancer
